item.title: January --- Quote of the Month: -----------------" If you have the power to make someone happy, Do it! The World needs more of that!"
Kodi Box Maintenance: Unplug your modem for 2 minutes and plug back in to help with buffering issues.
------ We wish you and your family a Happy New Year! Feel free to call or text us at (440) 703-0093 with any questions or issues.-------
